findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The function getReferralRewards() uses a double loop to iterate through referrals list, which can cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if the addresses list is too long.

findings.title: Inconsistent Commented Code for Liquidity Support Fee
findings.description: The liquidity support fee is 20%, but the code comment indicates 30% which does not reflect in the liquidity support fee or has no function in the contract.

findings.title: Contract penalty fee remains on the contract, but there is no native token withdrawal function.
findings.description: The contract has a penalty fee, but it lacks a native token withdrawal function to utilize this fee.
